item.description: Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1203; 04:34PM; WB 210 Fwy x La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z2zPhk; #ShadowHills; Firefighters arrived at the scene of a vehicle vs. big rig to find two persons deceased at the scene. Nothing further. CHP Log 2138.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E91 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA75 RA898 T74 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Brush Fire; INC#1088; 03:30PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #PorterFire; After approximately 24 hours, there continues to be hot spots and active flames within the burn footprint, however the perimeter of the fire has remain unchanged since yesterday evening. After a more thorough survey, the fire was found to be held to just 4.09 acres. The area remains under continuous monitoring by LAFD firefighters ("fire watch"). Crews remaining in the area are positioned to ensure the current perimeter holds. No reported injuries.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E106 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E36 E37 E39 E42 E48 E55 E63 E67 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E84 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Grass Fire; INC#0752; 01:14PM; WB 90 Fwy x Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5jZHr; #DelRey; It took just over an hour for 30 firefighters to stop forward progress, and contain the burn to approximately 2 acres of medium-heavy brush. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 AR21 BC11 BC4 E263 E295 E58 E62 E63 E94 PH1 RA63 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire; INC#0752; 12:01PM; WB 90 Fwy x Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5jZHr; #DelRey; Approximately two acres of grass and medium brush on fire between the eastbound and westbound portions of the Marina Expressway (east of the Marina del Rey Garden Center). No structures threatened. Portions of the Marina Expressway are shut down for responder safety.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC11 BC4 E263 E295 E58 E62 E63 E94 RA63 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0781; 12:40PM; 23 N Oakmont Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/38xBS5d; #Brentwood; Thirty-six firefighters extinguished fire on the third floor of a three-story hillside home in 26 minutes. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC5 BC9 E19 E237 E269 E290 E37 E59 E71 E90 H3 HA3 RA19 RA837 T37 T69; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0781; 12:14PM; 23 N Oakmont Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/38xBS5d; #Brentwood; Three-story hillside home with smoke showing.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC5 BC9 E19 E237 E269 E290 E37 E59 E71 H3 HA3 RA19 RA837 T37 T69; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1532; 09:05PM; 8325 S Stanford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wuJXzx; #Florence; 30 Firefighters took just 28 minutes to access, confine and extinguish an outside rubbish fire that extended to and involved several detached garages. No injury. No other structures. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E57 E65 RA257 RA833 RA865 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1532; 08:33PM; 8325 S Stanford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wuJXzx; #Florence; Outside rubbish fire has extended to involve several detached garages. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E264 E33 E57 E65 RA257 RA833 RA865 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #PorterRanch - 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update #PorterRanch - Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 05:30PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; While the fire's (area of) *origin* has been localized to *at or near* a freeway adjacent homeless encampment, the specific *cause* of the wildfire has yet to be determined by Investigators. LAFD and allied agency resources are expected to remain at scene through the night.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E37 E39 E63 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88 + LACoFD + ANF; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #PorterFire 05/15/2022 INC#1088

item.description: Update #PorterFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1088; 05:25PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #Chatsworth; 140 LAFD Firefighters continue to work the perimeter of the fire, which is now 75% contained, and remains at an estimated seven (7) acres. Hand crews from the Los Angeles County Fire Department and Angeles National Forest are assigned to assist with further containment, felling of dangerous tree limbs and cold trailing of the fire's perimeter. One civilian pickup truck parked at the Porter Ranch Drive park-and-ride lot adjacent to the 118 Freeway, was destroyed by fire. No injury. No structure damage. No evacuation. LAFD Investigators have yet to formally determine the specific origin and cause of the blaze.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E37 E39 E63 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88 + LACoFD + ANF; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey
